title: WHERE DID MY FRIENDS GO????

replies.body: Ur friends are gone until you purchase this add a friend feature for only $9.99

lucky you! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Reported to Riot about 25 minutes ago: 

Hey there, N0Point! KingPantaloons from Riot Tech Support here!

Looks like this is an emergent issue that we're seeing on our end as well. We've already got the engineers working on a fix. There's no current ETA for the fix, but your friend's list isn't gone, I promise!

Please be patient with us, we're on the case!

KingPantaloons
Player Support
